title: ISic004379. Funerary epitaph for Diognis
body:
1οἴμοι ὀ̃ Δίογνι   ←

1ΟΙΜΟΙΟ̃ΔΙΟΓΝΙ  ←

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Brugnone 2018

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Alas, O Diognis!

commentary

The inscription lacks a known provenance, but the formula of οἴμοι ὀ͂ + vocative is only attested at Selinunte, from where another 12 examples are known (listed in Brugnone 2018 with discussion regarding the hypothesis of C. Sourvinou-Inwood that this may reflect the influence of a western Sicilian indigenous attitude towards the commemoration of the dead and the afterlife)

bibliography

  • 2018.0518 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001282
  • Brugnone 2018 135 and fig.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002279
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
